yes.title: Allowed
yes.description: Access permitted by law; a right of way

no.title: Prohibited
no.description: Access not permitted to the general public

permissive.title: Permissive
permissive.description: Access permitted until such time as the owner revokes the permission

private.title: Private
private.description: Access permitted only with permission of the owner on an individual basis

designated.title: Designated
designated.description: Access permitted according to signs or specific local laws

destination.title: Destination
destination.description: Access permitted only to reach a destination

dismount.title: Dismount
dismount.description: Access permitted but rider must dismount

lane.title: Standard bike lane
lane.description: A bike lane separated from auto traffic by a painted line

shared_lane.title: Shared bike lane
shared_lane.description: A bike lane with no separation from auto traffic

track.title: Bike track
track.description: A bike lane separated from traffic by a physical barrier

share_busway.title: Bike lane shared with bus
share_busway.description: A bike lane shared with a bus lane

opposite_lane.title: Opposite bike lane
opposite_lane.description: A bike lane that travels in the opposite direction of traffic

opposite.title: Contraflow bike lane
opposite.description: A bike lane that travels in both directions on a one-way street

options.0: 0: Solid gravel/packed earth, no obstacles, wide curves
options.1: 1: Some loose surface, small obstacles, wide curves
options.2: 2: Much loose surface, large obstacles, easy hairpins
options.3: 3: Slippery surface, large obstacles, tight hairpins
options.4: 4: Loose surface or boulders, dangerous hairpins
options.6: 6: Not rideable except by the very best mountain bikers

options.0: 0: Avg. incline <10%, gravel/packed earth, no obstacles
options.1: 1: Avg. incline <15%, gravel/packed earth, few small objects
options.2: 2: Avg. incline <20%, stable surface, fistsize rocks/roots
options.3: 3: Avg. incline <25%, variable surface, fistsize rocks/branches
options.4: 4: Avg. incline <30%, poor condition, big rocks/branches
options.5: 5: Very steep, bike generally needs to be pushed or carried

options.separated: In smoking areas, not physically isolated

options.bad: Robust Wheels: trekking bike, car, rickshaw
options.very_bad: High Clearance: light duty off-road vehicle

options.grade1: Solid: paved or heavily compacted hardcore surface
options.grade2: Mostly Solid: gravel/rock with some soft material mixed in
options.grade3: Even mixture of hard and soft materials
options.grade4: Mostly Soft: soil/sand/grass with some hard material mixed in

options.excellent: Excellent: unambiguous path or markers everywhere
options.good: Good: markers visible, sometimes require searching
options.intermediate: Intermediate: few markers, path mostly visible
options.bad: Bad: no markers, path sometimes invisible/pathless
options.horrible: Horrible: often pathless, some orientation skills required
options.no: No: pathless, excellent orientation skills required
